sn22.79:1.2: “Ye hi keci, bhikkhave, samana va brahmana va anekavihitam pubbenivasam anussaramana anussaranti sabbete pancupadanakkhandhe anussaranti etesam va annataram.
sn22.79:1.5: iti va hi, bhikkhave, anussaramano rupamyeva anussarati.
sn22.79:1.7: iti va hi, bhikkhave, anussaramano vedanamyeva anussarati.
sn22.79:1.11: iti va hi, bhikkhave, anussaramano vinnanameva anussarati.
sn22.79:2.4: Sitenapi ruppati, unhenapi ruppati, jighacchayapi ruppati, pipasayapi ruppati, damsamakasavatatapasarisapasamphassenapi ruppati.
sn22.79:3.4: Sukhampi vedayati, dukkhampi vedayati, adukkhamasukhampi vedayati.
sn22.79:4.4: Nilampi sanjanati, pitakampi sanjanati, lohitakampi sanjanati, odatampi sanjanati.
sn22.79:5.4: Rupam rupattaya sankhatamabhisankharonti, vedanam vedanattaya sankhatamabhisankharonti, sannam sannattaya sankhatamabhisankharonti, sankhare sankharattaya sankhatamabhisankharonti, vinnanam vinnanattaya sankhatamabhisankharonti.
sn22.79:6.4: Ambilampi vijanati, tittakampi vijanati, katukampi vijanati, madhurampi vijanati, kharikampi vijanati, akharikampi vijanati, lonikampi vijanati, alonikampi vijanati.
sn22.79:7.1: Tatra, bhikkhave, sutava ariyasavako iti patisancikkhati:
sn22.79:7.3: Atitampaham addhanam evameva rupena khajjim, seyyathapi etarahi paccuppannena rupena khajjami.
sn22.79:7.4: Ahanceva kho pana anagatam rupam abhinandeyyam, anagatampaham addhanam evameva rupena khajjeyyam, seyyathapi etarahi paccuppannena rupena khajjami’ti.
sn22.79:7.5: So iti patisankhaya atitasmim rupasmim anapekkho hoti;
sn22.79:7.7: paccuppannassa rupassa nibbidaya viragaya nirodhaya patipanno hoti.
sn22.79:8.2: Atitampaham addhanam evameva vedanaya khajjim, seyyathapi etarahi paccuppannaya vedanaya khajjami.
sn22.79:8.3: Ahanceva kho pana anagatam vedanam abhinandeyyam;
sn22.79:8.4: anagatampaham addhanam evameva vedanaya khajjeyyam, seyyathapi etarahi paccuppannaya vedanaya khajjami’ti.
sn22.79:8.5: So iti patisankhaya atitaya vedanaya anapekkho hoti;
sn22.79:8.7: paccuppannaya vedanaya nibbidaya viragaya nirodhaya patipanno hoti.
sn22.79:9.3: Atitampaham addhanam evameva sankharehi khajjim, seyyathapi etarahi paccuppannehi sankharehi khajjamiti.
sn22.79:9.4: Ahanceva kho pana anagate sankhare abhinandeyyam;
sn22.79:9.5: anagatampaham addhanam evameva sankharehi khajjeyyam, seyyathapi etarahi paccuppannehi sankharehi khajjami’ti.
sn22.79:9.6: So iti patisankhaya atitesu sankharesu anapekkho hoti;
sn22.79:9.8: paccuppannanam sankharanam nibbidaya viragaya nirodhaya patipanno hoti.
sn22.79:10.2: Atitampi addhanam evameva vinnanena khajjim, seyyathapi etarahi paccuppannena vinnanena khajjami.
sn22.79:10.3: Ahanceva kho pana anagatam vinnanam abhinandeyyam;
sn22.79:10.4: anagatampaham addhanam evameva vinnanena khajjeyyam, seyyathapi etarahi paccuppannena vinnanena khajjami’ti.
sn22.79:10.5: So iti patisankhaya atitasmim vinnanasmim anapekkho hoti;
sn22.79:10.7: paccuppannassa vinnanassa nibbidaya viragaya nirodhaya patipanno hoti.
sn22.79:11.4: “Yam pananiccam dukkham va tam sukham va”ti?
sn22.79:11.6: “Yam pananiccam dukkham viparinamadhammam, kallam nu tam samanupassitum:
sn22.79:11.14: “Yam pananiccam dukkham va tam sukham va”ti?
sn22.79:11.16: “Yam pananiccam dukkham viparinamadhammam, kallam nu tam samanupassitum:
sn22.79:11.19: “Tasmatiha, bhikkhave, yam kinci rupam atitanagatapaccuppannam ajjhattam va bahiddha va olarikam va sukhumam va hinam va panitam va yam dure santike va, sabbam rupam: ‘netam mama, nesohamasmi, na meso atta’ti evametam yathabhutam sammappannaya datthabbam.
sn22.79:11.23: yam kinci vinnanam atitanagatapaccuppannam …pe… yam dure santike va, sabbam vinnanam: ‘netam mama, nesohamasmi, na meso atta’ti evametam yathabhutam sammappannaya datthabbam.
sn22.79:12.1: Ayam vuccati, bhikkhave, ariyasavako apacinati, no acinati;
sn22.79:13.1: Evam passam, bhikkhave, sutava ariyasavako rupasmimpi nibbindati, vedanayapi … sannayapi … sankharesupi … vinnanasmimpi nibbindati.
sn22.79:13.2: Nibbindam virajjati; viraga vimuccati. Vimuttasmim vimuttamiti nanam hoti.
sn22.79:13.3: ‘Khina jati, vusitam brahmacariyam, katam karaniyam, naparam itthattaya’ti pajanati.
sn22.79:14.1: Ayam vuccati, bhikkhave, bhikkhu nevacinati na apacinati, apacinitva thito; neva pajahati na upadiyati, pajahitva thito; neva visineti na ussineti, visinetva thito; neva vidhupeti na sandhupeti vidhupetva thito
sn22.79:14.2: Kinca nevacinati na apacinati, apacinitva thito?
sn22.79:14.3: Rupam nevacinati na apacinati, apacinitva thito;
sn22.79:14.7: vinnanam nevacinati na apacinati, apacinitva thito.
sn22.79:14.8: Kinca neva pajahati na upadiyati, pajahitva thito?
sn22.79:14.9: Rupam neva pajahati na upadiyati, pajahitva thito;
sn22.79:14.13: vinnanam neva pajahati na upadiyati, pajahitva thito.
sn22.79:14.14: Kinca neva visineti na ussineti, visinetva thito?
sn22.79:14.15: Rupam neva visineti na ussineti, visinetva thito;
sn22.79:14.19: vinnanam neva visineti na ussineti, visinetva thito.
sn22.79:14.20: Kinca neva vidhupeti na sandhupeti, vidhupetva thito?
sn22.79:14.21: Rupam neva vidhupeti na sandhupeti, vidhupetva thito;
sn22.79:14.25: vinnanam neva vidhupeti na sandhupeti, vidhupetva thito.
sn22.79:14.26: Evamvimuttacittam kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhum sainda deva sabrahmaka sapajapatika arakava namassanti:
